channel.title: Problems validating subscription
channel.description:
So I just updated to the latest Auxy today (previously on v5.1) and since then have noticed an unusual yet consistent bug. Every time I open Auxy and then exit it, the subscription will toggle states from the previous time I had opened the app. So for example, if I had the subscription and then closed the app (not force quit necessarily) and then reopened it even a minute later, all the sounds would show as locked and restore purchases will show nothing that needs to be restored. Closing and then immediately reopening it would return it to the subscription state.
The bug inherently has a workaround so it's tolerable but it's incredibly annoying when trying to use other apps along with Auxy. I was wondering if anyone else had this and if they had found a fix.
Cheers :clinking_glasses:
Running an iPad Pro iOS 12.1

item.title: Problems validating subscription
item.dc:creator: Auxy
item.description:
Thanks! We’ll try to get this fixed in the next update.

Read full topic

item.title: Problems validating subscription
item.dc:creator: Arimyth
item.description:
Yes, I still have it. I’ve just sent you the screen capture. Sorry for the delayed response.

Read full topic

item.title: Problems validating subscription
item.dc:creator: Auxy
item.description:
Do you still have this problem @Arimyth? If so, could you make a screen capture and email to feedback@auxy?

Read full topic

item.title: Problems validating subscription
item.dc:creator: obexg
item.description:
I remember it had something to do with uploading. It was so long ago I don’t know all the details.

Read full topic

item.title: Problems validating subscription
item.dc:creator: Auxy
item.description:
Thanks! Yeah it’s ok to post in the forum but usually we can resolve things regardless.

Read full topic

item.title: Problems validating subscription
item.dc:creator: Arimyth
item.description:
I wrote to forum to poll the crowd on whether it was common / uncommon and tangentially whether anyone had discovered any fixes for it. Will definitely make sure to email you guys directly in addition to that next time.

Read full topic

item.title: Problems validating subscription
item.dc:creator: Auxy
item.description:
If anyone has a similar problem, or ANY problem with subscription locking etc., please let us know!

Read full topic

item.title: Problems validating subscription
item.dc:creator: Auxy
item.description:
Thanks for reporting, although it’s better that you email us directly than writing in the forum. We have made some changes to how the app handles “restore purchases” so this might be related to that. Will tell Fredrik to invest.

Read full topic

item.title: Problems validating subscription
item.dc:creator: Auxy
item.description:
Well, before we can fix any problem we need to know that it exists, so it’s always a good idea to contact support when something like this happens instead of finding a workaround.

Read full topic

item.title: Problems validating subscription
item.dc:creator: Auxy
item.description:
What do you mean? Could you send an email to support from within the app and explain how the song got lost? Shouldn’t happen obviously.

Read full topic

item.title: Problems validating subscription
item.dc:creator: iammane
item.description:
@Auxy @Fredrik I found another topic about this and merged here. I myself haven’t seen this but interesting that at least three folks have.

Definitely worth sending email to feedback@auxy.co. If you do it from the app (Subscription at bottom > Contact Support) it will send a log too.

Read full topic

item.title: Problems validating subscription
item.dc:creator: AzureOnyx
item.description:
Weird, that never happened to me…

You thinking of sending the devs a direct email about it? Chances are that the log file provided in the email will help the devs fix that nasty bug.

Read full topic

item.title: Problems validating subscription
item.dc:creator: AzureOnyx
item.description:
I’ve had that same exact problem not too long ago. It’s best if you directly email staff about this, as doing so will provide them a log file that contains analytical data that that affected device records. Ultimately, this can help solve your problem.

Read full topic

item.title: Problems validating subscription
item.dc:creator: XLXK
item.description:
I keep getting this error once every month when my subscription renews, it says I don’t have it when I obviously do. Sometimes this fixes itself over time, sometimes I have to cancel the subscription and sub to get the sounds. All and all, it’s really annoying. If this could be your main priority first that would be amazing!

Read full topic

item.title: Problems validating subscription
item.dc:creator: obexg
item.description:
Tip: Maybe u could restart the device u have. It actually worked once.

Read full topic

item.title: Problems validating subscription

item.description:
Me neither. I did lose a song once.

item.description:

So I just updated to the latest Auxy today (previously on v5.1) and since then have noticed an unusual yet consistent bug. Every time I open Auxy and then exit it, the subscription will toggle states from the previous time I had opened the app. So for example, if I had the subscription and then closed the app (not force quit necessarily) and then reopened it even a minute later, all the sounds would show as locked and restore purchases will show nothing that needs to be restored. Closing and then immediately reopening it would return it to the subscription state.

The bug inherently has a workaround so it’s tolerable but it’s incredibly annoying when trying to use other apps along with Auxy. I was wondering if anyone else had this and if they had found a fix.
